Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory15.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: 'That Hassen was definitely lying to us.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Why do you say that?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'Just based on my experience. I have seen similar plots in the games that Kamui played.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'The humble-looking King could actually be the final Boss.', 4: '1'}
{2: "That's a lot of detail!", 3: '8', 4: "I don't think Hassen is like that.", 5: '9'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "Details are always good. They help us to locate the objective. Don't you think?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "Remember, this is a game. That wasn't the real Hassen.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'I kind of learned what type of person Celica was yesterday. This King is probably set like Hassen in purpose to make others think he is a good guy.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'A disguise, huh? Are you saying this Hassen is evil, and the Demons are good?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Both can be evil though.', 3: '1001', 4: 'Are you so sure that Hassen is evil?', 5: '1004'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'You have a good point, Commandant.', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "A good ruler doesn't necessarily have to be kind, but he must let others fear his authority. That Hassen apparently failed to do so.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Yeah, no matter what we said, he was always smiling. Disgusting.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "So why didn't we just beat that Hassen up? If he was evil, we could have skipped a lot of hassle.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'He had no HP bar.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'HP bar... What is that?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'Remember the enemies we fought earlier on? I could check their status and remaining health through the system, but not NPCs like Hassen.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'They were not configured as enemies that we could attack.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'This is a game. Even if we can attack him, if he has no HP bar, he "cannot" be killed.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: '...How are we going to deal with enemies like that?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "There are many ways, but all are up to the game settings, we can't really change that from our end.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "How annoying... Anyway, let's focus on the Demons and Liv now.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'True. But if my guess is right, Hassen should be the final Boss.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'What a boring plot.', 4: '3'}
{3: 'The three villain Constructs kept attacking the old-school plot and inappropriate game settings, as if they were professional game designers.'}
{3: "Which completely destroyed the unfortunate listener's interests and dreams."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'So this must be one of those compulsory fights. Well, Commandant of Gray Raven, now is your time to shine. Make sure we clear in the first attempt!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Just do whatever you want.', 3: '30', 4: 'Alright, leave it to me.', 5: '3000'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Fine, we don't need a stable mind to unlock our full strength here. Just hide somewhere safe, okay?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'In the first attempt, huh... What will happen if we die in this game?', 4: '1'}
